tasks.label: Build Velvex Wasm
tasks.command: function py { & python $args }; .\src\emsdk\emsdk_env.ps1; emcc -std=c++17 -O3 -I "src/headers" "src/main.cpp" "src/assets/tokenExtractor.cpp" "src/assets/tokenProcessor.cpp" "src/assets/expressionParser.cpp" "src/assets/integHandler.cpp" "src/assets/defintegHandler.cpp" "src/assets/fracHandler.cpp" "src/assets/diffHandler.cpp" "src/assets/pdiffHandler.cpp" "src/assets/sqrtHandler.cpp" "src/assets/symbolHandler.cpp" "src/assets/matrixHandler.cpp" "src/assets/piecewiseHandler.cpp" "src/assets/predefHandler.cpp" -o "public/velvex_compiler.js" -s EXPORTED_RUNTIME_METHODS=['ccall'] -s MODULARIZE=1 -s EXPORT_NAME='createVelvexModule'
